Job Description: As an Software Engineer 2, your key responsibilities will include:• Developing C# .NET and ASP.NET solutions for the organization.Creating in-house applications using the .NET framework.On C#, good knowledge of concepts and preferred working knowledge of C#, WPF, MVVM, .Net framework, WCF, and distributed architecture.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.Experience in various domains, with skillsets including working knowledge of windows and windows embedded environment.Good understanding of tools covering Git, Jira, Secure Development, Scans, Vulnerabilities, and security based coding practices.Good understanding of networking concepts, debugging/ troubleshooting and Thin Client (Windows).Good knowledge of concepts and preferred working knowledge in C++, C, Java Scripting, PowerShell/ Python Scripting.Work with outside data sources and APIs.Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.Reporting and resolving issues related to .NET projectsWork on bug fixing and improving application performance.Strong critical thinking and root cause identification skills.Analyze, Design and implementation of SW-Components for usage in Realtime embedded Environment.Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.Responsible for the ensuring implementing and design solution that can run on devices/PC with Window OS. Linux OS knowledge would be added advantage.Requirements :2 to 5 years of hands-on software development experience in C#, .NET, ASP.NET.Experience in software development experience.Experience in Windows Application development.Experience in C# development.Should be good in UI Design and development using XAML.Participate as a team member in fully agile Scrum deliveries.
